name: Honey-Mustard and Curry Chicken Thighs
author: Brad Istace
summary: Chicken thighs with honey, mustard, and curry. You will want to be home while this is cooking so that you can baste it occasionally. Produces a delicious sauce that goes well with rice.
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Flatten chicken thighs and squeeze tightly into a square baking dish
Combine honey, mustard, curry powder, and salt in a bowl
Bake, uncovered, in the preheated oven until chicken is no longer pink in the center and juices run clear, about 50 minutes, basting occasionally with the honey-mustard sauce
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
